label: diseaseName
comment: The name of the disease corresponding to this observation.

label: diseaseCode
comment: The unique code of the disease corresponding to this observation.

label: infectionStage
comment: The current stage of the infection caused by the disease or pest corresponding to this observation. For eg., initial infestation, colonization, feeding and damage, incubation, reproduction etc.

label: pestName
comment: The name of the organism/pest which has caused the crop disease.

label: pestCode
comment: The unique code identifying the organism which has affected the crop.

label: preventiveMeasures
comment: The measures to eliminate or reduce the risk of a problem, hazard, or negative event before it occurs.

label: controlMeasures
comment: The measures that need to be taken in order to mitigate or control the adverse effects of a problem, hazard, or any unfavourable incidents.

label: diseaseSymptoms
comment: Respresents the symptoms for the crop disease.

label: partsAffected
comment: The parts of the crop affected by the crop disease or pest.

label: mediaURL
comment: Link(s) to any image(s) or media of the issue or place corresponding to this observation

label: diseaseImpact
comment: The effects and consequences of crop diseases(caused by pathogens such as bacteria, viruses, fungi, and parasites) on farmers, communities, ecosystems and public health.

label: pestImpact
comment: The effects and consequences of pests over the crops and croplands.
